title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Bengio is senior director of Artificial ... Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne. He was a longtime scientist at Google, where he led a large group of researchers working in machine learning, including adversarial settings....

title: Samy Bengio - Research at Google
snippet: Samy Bengio (PhD in computer science, University of Montreal, 1993) is a research scientist at Google since 2007. Before that, he was senior researcher in statistical machine learning at IDIAP Research Institute since 1999, where he supervised PhD students and postdoctoral fellows.

title: Samy Bengio
snippet: Samy Bengio joined Google in 2007 as a research scientist specializing in machine learning.[9] Over the course of his 14-year tenure, he focused on developing algorithms and deep architectures for large-scale applications, including ranking ...
